amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the authority of regulators over government sponsored enterprises.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to clarify that potential risks should be posed to the enterprises with respect to the nature of portfolio holdings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 383 - 36 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Mr. Westmoreland demanded a separate vote on the Neugebauer amendment (A005).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
